name: Tales of Enders
description:
Who is the ORACLE you might ask? Only the most destructive being ever to come to our planet and he's brought his army of ENDERS to help aid his terrible plans!

How do you beat the ORACLE? Only one way, you must find his eye and destroy it. Do this and humanity is saved.

This game is jam packed with 3 episodes and hours of maze solving, key finding, ENDER dodging fun.

NOW INCLUDES EXTRA EPISODE "TOWER OF ENDERS"!!!
